page.title: 13Children's Games.Kingsbury.
page.content: We often play{Forty-Forty}at playtime. Part of a wall is chosen as "a post".Someone with his eyes covered stands there to count to 44 while others hide.Then he looks for them. When he sees someone he says "40-40 See" and he names the person seen.Then he runs to touch the post before that person does.If the person named gets there first he says"40-40,home".This continues till all the people have been seen.If the last person arrives before the catcher he says "40-40 save all",and the game starts again with the original catcher. {Sticky Glue.}One person chases.Those touched stand with legs astride. Another person has to go through their legs to free them.If the chaser catches everyone,the first one caught takes over chasing.A variation of this has the chaser as a witch.
